channel.title: How should i install whonix on offshore dedi servers?
channel.description:
Hi
suppose i have KVM access to offshore dedi-servers, how can i install whonix (gateway + workstation) on them, is this possible? and after installation, how should i manage the workstation and gateway? is this all possible with KVM? please help me with this, thx

item.title: How should i install whonix on offshore dedi servers?
item.dc:creator: Ego
item.description:
Good day,

installing Whonix on a dedicated, rented server, should be no problem, as far as I’m concerned, however please keep in mind, that this isn’t, as far as my experience tells me, possible on something like a “normal V-Server” or any other kind of shared solution, but only on a totally dedicated solution.

Have a nice day
